Package it.polimi.se2019.view.cli

Class AsciiPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.cli.AsciiPlayer
  • public class AsciiPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the drawing of the information about the displayed player

      Print the weapons that the player possess, differentiating between unloaded(visible to everyone) and loaded(hidden) weapons

        static void printMarks​(ViewPlayer player)
        Print the marks that the player received, in the color of the player that marked him
        Parameters:

        Print the damages that the player received, in the color of the player that damaged him

      • printWeapons

        static void printWeapons​(java.util.List<ViewWeapon> unloadedWeapons,
                         java.util.List<ViewWeapon> loadedWeapons)
        Print the weapons that the player possess, differentiating between unloaded(visible to everyone) and loaded(hidden) weapons
        Parameters:
        unloadedWeapons - weapons that need to be reloaded before use
        loadedWeapons - weapons that can be used

      • printPowerUps

        static void printPowerUps​(View view)
        Print the current powerups(hidden from other players) that the displayed player possess
        Parameters:
        view - relative to the player whose powerups needs to be printed

      • printRewardPoint

        static void printRewardPoint​(ViewPlayer viewPlayer)
        Print the current reward points that the displayed player possess
        Parameters:
        viewPlayer - whose reward points need to be printed

      • drawPlayerInfo

        static void drawPlayerInfo​(ViewPlayer player,
                           java.util.List<ViewWeapon> loadedWeapons,
                           java.util.List<ViewWeapon> unloadedWeapons)
        Print the current powerups(hidden from other players) that the displayed player possess
        Parameters:
        player - whose info needs to be displayed
        loadedWeapons - to display (present only if the displayed player is the same as the client's player)
        unloadedWeapons - to display
